sqoop.arg: SELECT AcqCtxVarClassID,AcquisitionContextID,VariableTypeClassID,IsOS,IsOC, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcqCtxVarClass WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageID,AcquisitionVariantID,LastMeasurementSetID,AcquisitionContextID,LastDoneDT,IsAttrOC,IsCriticalDefect, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionContext WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,AcquisitionID,MeasurementSetTagProfileID,PartInstanceTagProfileID,DefectTagProfileID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RfDataCollectionFreqID,DataCollectionPeriod,IsRetired,AcqPlan,VMTPID,CauseActionTPID,Variant,PartTypeID,RevisionNo,IsEdited,HeadAlias,CauseTagListID,ActionTagListID,IsMeasuredWhenProduced,IsInvPackCheck,IsEBATrigger, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ActionPlanID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,ActionTypeID,ActionSubTypeID,ActionPlanCode,ActionName,Description,ActionPlanOrder,RfPriorityID,IsRetired,VariableTypeID,AttributeTypeID,IsCompulsory,SortOrder,IsOCApplicable,IsOSApplicable, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionPlan WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AddressID,Address1,Address2,City,County,PostCode,Country, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Address WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetID,ParentAssetID,SubAssetID,Lvl,SortOrder,Comments,AssetLevelID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AttributeTypeGroupID,Name,Description,AttributeTypeGroupCode, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AttributeTypeGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT BOMItemID,BOMVariantID,PartID,SubPartID,SubPartQuantity,SubPartUnitID,RfInvPackTraceabilityID,Sequence,Instructions,RfBOMItemTypeID,IsDefault,IsAllowExceedBOMQty,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMItem WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CommentsID,LoginID,DT,Subject,Comments, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Comments WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernTypeID,ConcernType,Description,ConcernTypeCode,Format, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ConcernType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CustomerID,Customer,CustomerCode,AddressID,RfLanguageID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Customer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DocumentID,FileName,Description,MimeType,Attachment,UploadDT,LoginID,DocumentTypeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Document WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT FaultID,Fault,FaultComments,AssetID,MaintenanceWorkID,ReportedByLoginID,FaultReportedDT,CommonFaultID,FaultStateID,TimeToRespond,TimeToRepair,TimeResponseToRepair,RevisionNo,IsEdited,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Cause,MachineStopID,Symptoms, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Fault WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT GaugeTypeID,GaugeType, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.GaugeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryUsageID,StartUsingComments,StopUsingComments,StartLoginID,StopLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedEndDT,SavedStartDT,SavedEndDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedInventoryUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineGroupID,LineGroup,LineGroupCode,Description,OEETarget,WasteTarget,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineSectionID,LineSection,Description,IsRetired, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineSection WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AttributeTypeGroupID,AttributeTypeID,LkATATGID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkATATG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LKConcernInventoryPackID,ConcernID,InventoryPackID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKConcernInventoryPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentAssetID,DocumentID,AssetID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentAsset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentWIStepID,WorkInstructionStepID,DocumentID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentWIStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineID,LineSectionID,LkLLSID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLLS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageID,MachineGroupID,LkMGMSID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMGMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartTypeID,OperationTypeID,IsInventoryCarriedOver,LkOpTPartTConsumedID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTPartTConsumed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkPartSupplierID,PartID,SupplierID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartSupplier WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCCalcStyleID,RfViolationRuleID,RfChartComponentID,LkSPCCSVRID,RuleRange,RuleGroup, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkSPCCSVR WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolStateID,ToolCavityID,RfToolCavityStatusID,ToolCavityStateReasonID,IsCavityChangeState,LkTSTCID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkTSTC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeGroupID,VariableTypeID,LkVTVTGID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkVTVTG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageCellID,MachineStageID,IsCreator,IsConsumer,IsLabeller,IsAutoBatchNo,IsPackConsumer,IsResortConsumer,IsNonJob,IsToolShowCavities,IsInvPackPackNo,IsInvPackPartNo,IsInvPackPartDesc,IsInvPackPartType,IsInvPackQty,IsInvPackHeader,IsInvPackRows,IsInvPackState,IsInvPackReason,IsAcqDblck,AcqGrid,CustomPage,IsClickable,IsDrillable, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageCell WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageTypeID,Name,Description,MachineStageTypeCode, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceManHourPlannedID,MaintenanceProcedureID,PlannedManHours,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,SupplierCost, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceManHourPlanned WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureID,MaintenanceProcedure,PartID,ResponsibleDepartmentID,BudgetWorkDone,PlannedManHours,PlannedDuration,MaintenanceProcedureCode,AdvanceWarningPeriod,SchedulingWindow,PlannedMachineStageDowntime,PlannedLineDowntime,SubPartID,CreatedDT,CreatedLoginID,RfMaintenanceWorkTypeID,CostCentreID,IsAutoAuthoriseWork,IsRetired,IsToolTakenOutOfService, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedure WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureStepID,MaintenanceProcedureStep,MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,StepOrder,SubPartID,Component,RfMaintenanceCheckTypeID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,Test,USL,LSL,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,Nom,Units,DecPlaces, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceWorkStatusID,MaintenanceWorkStatus,Description,RfMaintenanceWorkStatusID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWorkStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetPID,ActualAttrSampleSize,AcquisitionContextID,IsEdited,DT,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RevisionNo,PartID,JobID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSetP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCClientID,OPCClient,ComputerID,ModifiedDT,LastUpdateDT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCClient WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCGroupID,Deadband,UpdateRate,OPCGroup,IsActive,RfGroupNotifyModeID,TimeBias,OPCServerID,IsPublic,LocalID,CacheUpdateRate, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCMachineEventCodeID,OPCMachineEventCode,OPCMachineEventID,MachineStopReasonID,IsRunning, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCMachineEventCode WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCTextID,OPCItemID,Description,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCText WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartInstanceID,MeasurementSetID,HeadNo,SampleNo,SerialNo, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartInstance WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductID,ProductTypeID,Name,Description,IsRetired,PartID,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Product WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductTypeID,Name,ProductTypeCode,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ScrapID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedScrapID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Scrap_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantNameTemplatesID,CreateInvPackNoTemplate,CustomerUniqueKeyTemplate,InventoryPackNameTemplate,WONumberTemplate,ReceiveInvPackNoTemplate,BOMVariantTemplate, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantNameTemplates WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftPatternID,ShiftPattern,PatternDuration,IsPatternDirty,IsCustomPeriod, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftPattern WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartComponentID,SPCChartDefID,SPCVarChartID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartComponent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetViewID,SPCChartSetView,Sequence,SPCChartSetID,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,OverlayFlags, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSetView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCRuleID,SPCRule,TAGMSTYPE1ID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCRule WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagCauseActionID,CauseActionID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagCauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagListValueID,TagListID,TagListValue,DisplayOrder,IsRetired, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagListValue WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTreeID,TagTree, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTree WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT TagProfileID,TagTypeID,EntryOrder,CompulsoryConditions,IsDefaulted,IsEncrypted,TagListID,IsReadOnly,RptQueryID,TagTypeInTagProfileID,TagTreeID,RfTagDataSourceID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTypeInTagProfile WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolID,Tool,ToolSet,Description,ToolTypeID,IsRetired,NoCavities,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,PartID,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolCavityID,CavityNumber,CavityName,ToolID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolCavity WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolStateID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,RfToolStatusID,LoginID,Comments,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT UnitID,Unit,Description, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Unit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT UnitCountTypeID,UnitCountType,Description,MachineStageTypeID,DefaultUnitID,IsQuantityIn,IsQuantityOut,IsMaintenanceCount,IsConvertableToBaseUnits,AssetCountTypeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCountType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT VariableTypeID,Name,ProductTypeID,Description,IsUnilateral,VariableTypeCode,IsProcessParameter,VariableTypeClassID,ImageURI, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT VarMeasurementPID,SpecID,MeasurementSetPID,Measurement,Ignored,VariableTypeID,ProductID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,DT,RfIsOSID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarMeasurementP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WORefID,WOReference, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WORef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryPack.InventoryPackID, InventoryPack.InventoryPackNo, InventoryPack.WOID, InventoryPack.JobID, InventoryPack.CreatedFromDT, InventoryPack.CreatedToDT, InventoryPack.CreatedOnMachineStageID, InventoryPack.IsEdited, InventoryPack.RevisionNo, InventoryPack.PartID, InventoryPack.Quantity, InventoryPack.UnitID, InventoryPack.Ignored, InventoryPack.InventoryPackIndex, InventoryPack.CustomerUniqueKey, InventoryPack.ReceivedDT, InventoryPack.BirthDT, InventoryPack.LastBuildRecordID, InventoryPack.msrepl_tran_version, InventoryPack.CurrentQuantity, InventoryPack.QuantityAdjustment, InventoryPack.PositionNumber, InventoryPack.LocationID, InventoryPack.InvStateID, InventoryPack.LocationFromDT, InventoryPack_.Comments, InventoryPack_.LoginID, InventoryPack_.OpenedDT, InventoryPack_.SavedDT, InventoryPack_.OriginalLoginID, InventoryPack_.EditedInventoryPackID, InventoryPack_.Reference1, InventoryPack_.Reference2, InventoryPack_.Reference3, InventoryPack_.Reference4, InventoryPack_.Reference5, InventoryPack_.Reference6, InventoryPack_.Reference7, InventoryPack_.Reference8, InventoryPack_.Reference9, InventoryPack_.Reference10, InventoryPack_.SupplierID, InventoryPack_.SupplierReference, InventoryPack_.UseByDT, InventoryPack_.UseAfterDT, InventoryPack_Custom.Txn_date, InventoryPack_Custom.OracleStatus, InventoryPack_Custom.IntendedWOID, InventoryPack_Custom.FinalWOID, InventoryPack_Custom.OriginalQty, InventoryPack_Custom.Seq_Id, InventoryPack_Custom.From_Subinventory, InventoryPack_Custom.From_Locator, InventoryPack_Custom.To_Subinventory, InventoryPack_Custom.To_Locator, InventoryPack_Custom.ScrappedShiftID, InventoryPack_Custom.LastInventoryLabelID, InventoryPack_Custom.ScrapLocationID, InventoryPack_Custom.MachineLocationID, InventoryPack_Custom.ScrapReasonID, InventoryPack_Custom.ModuleInfoID, InventoryPack_Custom.ResealedDT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM InventoryPack FULL JOIN InventoryPack_ ON (InventoryPack.InventoryPackID = InventoryPack_.InventoryPackID) FULL JOIN InventoryPack_Custom ON (InventoryPack.InventoryPackID = InventoryPack_Custom.InventoryPackId) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStage.MachineStageID, MachineStage.MachineStageTypeID, MachineStage.Name, MachineStage.IsRetired, MachineStage.DepartmentID, MachineStage.Description, MachineStage.CurrentShiftPatternID, MachineStage.NoHeads, MachineStage.IsOEEBottleNeck, MachineStage.IsProductionOutput, MachineStage.MachineStopID, MachineStage.StoppedScreenThreshold, MachineStage.LineSectionID, MachineStage.IsDiscrete, MachineStage.RfDowntimeCollectionModeID, MachineStage.RfSpoilageCollectionModeID, MachineStage.RfProductionCollectionModeID, MachineStage.LastBuildRecordID, MachineStage.CurrentJobID, MachineStage_Custom.ModuleDatabase, MachineStage_Custom.IntendedWOID, MachineStage_Custom.MachineStageCode, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM MachineStage FULL JOIN MachineStage_Custom ON (MachineStage.MachineStageID = MachineStage_Custom.MachineStageID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
